attributes.action: Stop the transfer of Breast Cancer Services from Dorset County Hospital in Dorchester to Poole Hospital.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Centralisation of Breast Cancer and other Services from the accessable County Town of Dorchester to the inaccessable and congested town of Poole will result in a poorer service and avoidable delays in diagnosis and treatment.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Stop the transfer of Breast Cancer Services from Dorset County Hospital in Dorchester to Poole Hospital."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page23053


Prime Minister's Office
